units.name: Sheriff
units.description:
Battle Start
apply Mark +1
to all enemies

units.name: Shieldbearer
units.description:
Battle Start:
give Shield +1
to adjacent allies

units.name: Commander
units.description:
Ally Died:
give Strength +2
to random ally

units.name: Lifebringer
units.description:
Battle Start:
gain Vitality +1
for each unit in battle

units.name: Wither
units.description:
Before Death
apply Decay +1
to all enemies
